question:
You wish to study at a foreign university. Write a letter to the university. 


In your letter you should ask about:
 the accommodation and fees 
possible scholarships 
and the qualifications required for acceptance.
text: I am writing to enquire about some information with respect to my admission into your school. I am from France and would like to study at Manchester state university, United Kingdom.

I would like to know about your hostel accommodation; the available facilities, the rules and regulations, number of roommates, tenancy rate and how soon it will be available to students.  Also, I will like to inform you that I have two kids that will be visiting me during my stay on the campus.

If possible, can I know the various scholarship programs you have for international students? I do not have enough funds to cover  the five years course I wished to study in your college and I would prefer to work over the weekends.

In addition, after receiving an offer from your institution, I would like to know the required documents you would want me to provide in order to complete my enrolment in your school? I went through the school's website but could not find any such information on the admission page.
I look forward to hearing from you as soon as possible to enable finish up my admission process.
